settings.heroheader_heading_text: A trade partner that protects your margins – and your reputation.
settings.heroheader_paragraph_text: You’ve worked hard to earn your clients’ trust. When it’s your name on the box, you can’t afford production missteps, fulfilment mishaps, or inconsistent quality. That’s where we come in.

settings.pageheader_paragraph_text:
We’re the quiet engine powering our distributors — delivering production muscle that runs like clockwork. We hand you the tools to grow: exclusive wholesale pricing that actually protects your margin, rock-solid print capacity that scales on demand, and the peace of mind that comes from knowing your production partner’s got your back.

Everything is white-label by default. Everything is tailored to your workflow. And everything is built to help you look good, stay profitable, and never miss a beat.

settings.content_paragraph_text:
Your secret weapon for busy seasons.

When client orders pile up and your presses are maxed out, we step in as your silent sidekick — keeping your timelines, quality, and client relationships intact. With crisp DTG, screen printing, embroidery, and more, our white-label trade printing plugs seamlessly into your workflow. Every order gets the same care and consistency as if it came off your own floor. Fast turnarounds, reliable quality, and zero stress for you or your clients.

Your production powerhouse.

Custom product sourcing? Multi-method decoration? Full-scale fulfilment? Tick, tick, tick. We partner with trade operators who need the kind of production muscle that only comes with decades of experience and a network built for scale. You bring the vision — we design, build, and run the engine that brings it roaring to life, keeping every moving part on time, on brand, and on point.

settings.card_paragraph_text: We keep our wholesale rates crystal clear, with volume discounts that protect your margins and grow your bottom line — so you always know exactly what you’ll pay, can quote with confidence, and never get stung by surprise fees.

settings.card_heading_text: Access to premium quality blanks and specialty products.
settings.card_paragraph_text: Offer your clients more than the stock-standard range. Through our trade network, you get access to premium blanks likeAS Colour, niche items and accessories, and exclusive product lines you won’t find on retail shelves. It’s your shortcut to standing out, upselling with ease, and giving clients something they can’t get anywhere else.

settings.card_heading_text: Reliable turnarounds (that you can set your watch to).
settings.card_paragraph_text: Our standard production runs in 5–7 business days, with rush options ready for when deadlines come out of nowhere. We don’t pad the timeline or overpromise — we just deliver, exactly when we say we will. That means you can plan with confidence, keep projects moving, and meet even the tightest client deadlines without breaking a sweat.

settings.card_heading_text: Real humans delivering unmatched trade support.
settings.card_paragraph_text: We’ve lived and breathed this for over 30 years, so we get the rhythm and pace of your workflow — no long explanations needed. You can expect accurate quoting, proactive updates before you have to ask, and a dedicated trade team that works in sync with you to keep every job on track.

Every item, every order, every run is held to the same high standards. We don’t do shortcuts, and “good enough” isn’t in our vocabulary.

Whether it’s a small custom batch or a full-scale production run, your clients get merch of exceptional quality — precisely polished and unmistakably on-brand. That means you can deliver with complete confidence, knowing you look like a legend and your clients will be racing back for more.

From screen printing to embroidery, tote bags to tech kits — we cover it all, so you can offer clients more without juggling multiple suppliers. With one consistent production partner keeping things humming behind the scenes, you get on-brand, on-time products across every category, ready to impress the moment they land.

settings.bento_heading_text: The pit crew for trade pros since 1992.
settings.bento_paragraph_text: For over 30 years, we’ve been the trusted production partner for trade professionals who demand quality, reliability, and precision. Here's what you unlock as a Garage Distributor.

settings.cta_heading_text: Get our crew in your corner.
settings.cta_paragraph_text: Become a Garage Distributor and get a production partner that works as hard (and as fast) as you do. From white-label printing to full-scale fulfilment, we’re the behind-the-scenes crew that keeps your projects moving and your clients impressed, helping you deliver confidently, consistently, and without compromise.

settings.contact_heading_text: Need backend support you can trust?
settings.contact_paragraph_text: We slot right into your workflow, keep your clients happy, and make you look like a hero. Send us your brief in the message box, and let’s get to work.
